data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Apronopa van Achterberg (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae) with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Belokobylskij, Sergey A. (2018): A review of the genus Apronopa van Achterberg (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae) with a key to species. ZooKeys 793: 143-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.793.29313, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.793.29313
